item.title: The Packet's-Eye View of a Kubernetes Service
item.description: The Service and Ingress respectively brings L4 and L7 traffics to your pods. In this article, I focus on how traffic flows in and what are the interactions between the ingress controller and the service-lb controller (the thing that creates the external load balancer). I also detail how the `hostPort` approach shapes traffic.
